item.title: Have Yourself A Very Crafty Christmas With This Guide To The Perfect DIY Holiday
item.description: How refreshing would it be to escape the bustle to intentionally create something original with family and loved ones in mind this Christmas?

item.title: The Trump Transition Team Is Right To Protect Donors’ Privacy
item.description: Donor privacy is not merely a matter of convenience, but a fundamental right that enables free speech and civic engagement.

item.title: Dems renew push for limiting presidential clemency powers after Hunter Biden pardon
item.description: Calls to limit presidential pardon powers have fallen on party lines in the House of Representatives.

item.title: ‘100 Percent Bullsh-t’: Fox News Talent Shoot Down NBC’s Smear Campaign Against Pete Hegseth
item.description: NBC News' hit piece received immediate pushback from Hegseth's former Fox colleagues and network guests.

item.title: The Meaning of Infirmity
item.description: The U.K.’s vote in favor of medically assisted suicide may force another society to confront the reality, and significance, of frailty.

item.title: Former Vice President Mike Pence supports Trump's tough approach on trade
item.description: Former Vice President Mike Pence says President-elect Donald Trump isn't bluffing in his threat to impose new tariffs on China and other countries.

item.description: Disney’s latest social lecture panders.

item.title: Trump Blocking U.S. Steel Deal Would Be a Mistake
item.description: U.S. Steel has warned that without the Nippon Steel investment, it could close mills and move its headquarters from Pittsburgh.

item.title: 'Amtrak Joe' Biden uses his visit to Angola to promote a major U.S.-backed rail project in Africa
item.description: Even in the waning days of his presidency and thousands of miles from home, U.S. President Biden is finding ways to celebrate trains.

item.title: States Can and Should Protect Minors from Transgender Ideology

item.title: Yes, Ronald Reagan Won The Cold War
item.description: Ronald Reagan and Donald Trump exemplify the standard that there is no substitute for victory.

item.title: Remembering Lance Morrow
item.description: The essayist got better as he grew older, deepening his reflections on two themes that helped define more than a half century of his elegant writing.

item.title: Top House Democrat says Hunter Biden pardon was 'disappointing,' calls out Biden for flip-flop
item.description: Rep. Pete Aguilar says President Biden went back on his word when he pardoned his son, Hunter Biden.
